GIANT.spectral_influence: Intense radiation; habitable planets are rare and far out.

SUBGIANT.spectral_influence: Luminosity increasing; habitable zone shifts outward over time.

MAIN_SEQUENCE.spectral_influence: Stable output; ideal for long-term colonies.

WHITE_DWARF.spectral_influence: Low luminosity; narrow, close-in habitable zone; tidal locking likely.

RED_DWARF.spectral_influence: Frequent flares; high radiation risk in tight orbits.

WHITE_MAIN_SEQUENCE.spectral_influence: Hotter, shorter-lived; wide UV-rich habitable belt.
